As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. using the Planned Parenthood video as a rallying cry. Rep. Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) said this week that the video helps make the case for his bill that would strip Planned Parenthood of federal funding. Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking, he said. Mike Pence is also participating in a webcast Thursday night with almost a dozen anti-abortion rights groups to build support for his measure. to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.`` Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added:`` For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune.''

first-round series.`` He was on fire,'' Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. Anytime a guy like that is on fire, there's very little you can do except to take the ball out of his hands. It's right up there with Michael Jordan 's 63. He just had a great night. The NBA saw some superlative performances over the opening weekend of the playoffs, but the best came in the last game.
